ProcessDefinition.Title: Get Correlation Map by POI
ProcessDefinition.Abstract: Returns a Correlation Map: average gene expression correlation between the seed voxel supplied as POI and other voxels in the 3D brain.

LiteralInput.Title: Atlas SRS Name
LiteralInput.Abstract: The Atlas SRS (Spatial Reference System) name.

LiteralInput.Title: X-Coordinate Value
LiteralInput.Abstract: Value in the X dimension as defined in the SRS.

LiteralInput.Title: Y-Coordinate Value
LiteralInput.Abstract: Value in the Y dimension as defined in the SRS.

LiteralInput.Title: Z-Coordinate Value
LiteralInput.Abstract: Value in the Z dimension as defined in the SRS.

ComplexOutput.Title: GetCorrelationMapByPOI Output
ComplexOutput.Abstract: Returns a Correlation Map: average gene expression correlation between the seed voxel supplied as POI and other voxels in the 3D brain.
